pages.text: $(li)Stonelings are passive creatures that can be found in caves of the Overworld.$(br)$(li)They will spawn in carrying an item, and will get startled if you get too close to them without sneaking and holding a Diamond to tempt them.$(br)$(li)If startled, they will run away from you and finally poof out of existence.
On death, they will drop the item its carrying as well a Heart of Diamond.

$(li)You can use a Heart of Diamond to create tamed Stonelings.$(br)$(li)First you have to right click a Stone block while you are holding a Heart of Diamond in your hand to create your own tamed Stoneling!$(br)$(li)Tamed Stonelings can hold items you give them, eat Stone (they love it!), and follow you if you hold a Diamond.
